overview: A Japanese student film made in 2018 in the style of (and marketed as) a 1925 silent film, Ohdo went viral via the director's twitter campaign. Notably, the film is said to be created on an iPhone 7 using apps such as Perfect Video, Stop Motion, Video Star, ibisPaint X, and others. The film was submitted to the 65th NHK Cup National High School Broadcasting Contest, but did not surpass the preliminary rounds of the contest.
title: Ohdo
